Texts.Chs: 我再一次梦见橡木战士们。在我面前伸展的这支军队到底是什么？当我醒来时，我感到四肢僵硬。我觉得尘土地牢对我有点影响。我现在每周都需要一次干树汁治疗，即使这样，它也不能缓解我的不适。
Texts.Eng: I dream of oaken soldiers once more. Who is this army that sprawls before me? I feel a stiffening in my limbs as I wake. I think The Dust is getting to me. I require Drysap treatment once a week now, and even then it does little to ease my discomfort.

Texts.Chs: 今天我杀了一个囚犯。在去吃饭的路上，我把他推下了楼梯。其他卫兵欢呼雀跃，但我却没有这种快感。狩猎的刺激感已经消失了。我应该给他们点上一把火，看看他们狩猎得多好。
Texts.Eng: Today I killed a prisoner. I pushed him down the stairs on the way to dinner. The other guards cheered and hooted, but I felt no such pleasure. The thrill of the hunt is gone from me. I should set a torch to them and see how well they hunt then.
